data_table.description: Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP1
variable.description: Memory. Q1. Forget appointments [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP2
variable.description: Memory. Q2. Repeat the same questions or stories [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP3
variable.description: Memory. Q3. Forget conversations [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP4
variable.description: Memory. Q4. Spend More time looking for objects than in the past [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP5
variable.description: Memory. Q5. Trouble finding words [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP6
variable.description: Memory. Q6. Trouble with names [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP7
variable.description: Memory. Q7. Trouble with leaving stove/car lights on, or doors unlocked [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP8
variable.description: Memory. Q8. Memory worse this year [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP9
variable.description: Orientation. Q9. Driving accidents in past year [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP10
variable.description: Orientation. Q10. Drive with the help of a navigator [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP11
variable.description: Orientation. Q11. Gotten lost in familiar area [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP12
variable.description: Orientation. Q12. Difficulty finding way around familiar area of neighborhood? [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP13
variable.description: Judgment and Problem Solving. Q 13. Changes in ability to deal with money [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP14
variable.description: Judgment and Problem Solving. Q 14. Changes in ability to pay bills [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP15A
variable.description: Similarities. Q15a. Ways turnip cauliflower similar [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP15B
variable.description: Similarities. Q15b. Ways desk bookcase similar [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP16A
variable.description: Differences. Q16a. Ways lie mistake different [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP16B
variable.description: Differences. Q16b. Ways river canal different [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP17
variable.description: Calculations. Q17. How many nickels are in a dollar? (20) [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP18
variable.description: Calculations. Q18. How many quarters in $6.75? (27) [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP19
variable.description: Calculations. Q19. Subtract 3 from 20 and keep subtracting 3 from each number, all the way down? (20, 17, 14, 11, 8, 5, 2) [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP20
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q20. Are you still working? [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP20A
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q20a. Did memory problems interfere with your ability to do your job? [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP21
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q21. Do you belong to any groups (examples: senior citizen, religious, political, professional, volunteer, or social)? [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP22
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q22. Have you attended group functions or meetings in the past few months? [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP23
variable.description: Community Affairs. Q23. Receives help with shopping [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP24
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q24. Change in ability to do household chore [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP25
variable.description: Home and Hobbies. Q25. Change in involvement in hobbies [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP26
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q26. Answer to name of place [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP27
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q27. Answer to name of city [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP28
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q28. Answer to name of county [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP29
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q29. Answer to name of state [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP30
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q30. Answer to today's numerical date [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP31
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q31. Answer to today's month [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP32
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q32. Answer to today's year [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP33
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q33. Answer to day of the week [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP34
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q34. Answer to approximate time of day [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP35
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q35. Answer to current season [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP36
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q36. Answer to full name [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP37
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q37. Answer to age [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP38
variable.description: Blessed Test. Q38. Answer to full date of birth [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]

variable.name: CDP0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [Clinical Dementia Rating Subject Interview]
